metadata.title: CVE-2022-28948 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue in the Unmarshal function in Go-Yaml v3 causes the program to crash when attempting to deserialize invalid input.

notes.note: jdstrand> snapd contains an embedded copy of golang-goyaml sbeattie> according to upstream, this likely only affects v3 implementations only PoC in revoked snyk report

criterions.comment: golang-gopkg-yaml.v3 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
snapd package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
